author: xtqqczze
body:
In `test\powershell\engine\Help\assets\Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts_8e362604-2c0b-448f-a414-a6a690a644e2_HelpInfo.xml`

This URI is broken:
http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717973

302 (Moved Temporarily) to http://download.microsoft.com/download/2/3/0/23073AB1-2A89-45F0-8673-FBBA4636AF06/
where server responds 403 (Forbidden)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Could you please assign right man?

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@xtqqczze The URI is not broken. The behavior is expected as it redirects to a container.

```PowerShell
PS> Update-Help -Module Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts -Verbose -Force
VERBOSE: Resolving URI: "http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717973"
VERBOSE: Your connection has been redirected to the following URI:
"http://download.microsoft.com/download/2/3/0/23073AB1-2A89-45F0-8673-FBBA4636AF06/"
VERBOSE: Performing the operation "Update-Help" on target "Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts, Current Version:
5.1.1.0, Available Version: 5.1.1.0, UICulture: en-US".
VERBOSE: Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts: Updated
C:\WINDOWS\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts\1.0.0.0\en-US\Microsoft.Powershel
l.LocalAccounts.dll-Help.xml. Culture en-US Version 5.1.1.0
```

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
@adityapatwardhan @iSazonov Works for me too.
```powershell
PS> $PSVersionTable.PSEdition
Desktop
```
```powershell
PS> Update-Help -Module Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts -UICulture en-US -Verbose -Force
VERBOSE: Resolving URI: "http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717973"
VERBOSE: Your connection has been redirected to the following URI:
"https://download.microsoft.com/download/2/3/0/23073AB1-2A89-45F0-8673-FBBA4636AF06/"
VERBOSE: Performing the operation "Update-Help" on target "Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts, Current Version:
5.1.1.0, Available Version: 5.1.1.0, UICulture: en-US".
VERBOSE: Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts: Updated
C:\WINDOWS\system32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.LocalAccounts\1.0.0.0\en-US\Microsoft.Powershel
l.LocalAccounts.dll-Help.xml. Culture en-US Version 5.1.1.0
```

title: Broken HelpContentURI in test assets
